Gabriel Macht Net Worth is $9 million USD and earns an annual income of $2 million dollars. Gabriel Macht is an American actor. Gabriel Macht is known for playing The Spirit in the eponymous 2008 film adaptation. Gabriel Macht recently bought a brand new Mercedes Benz luxury car for $145,000. The Net Worth of Gabriel Macht has seen a hike of 24% over the past few years. While calculating the Net Worth of Gabriel Macht we have included the data updated as of this Quarter. Check out the Exclusive information on Gabriel Macht Net Worth details such as Yearly Income, House, Car Collection, Investments etc. Also read Net Worth details of Justin Chambers, Katherine Heigl and Katy Perry.

Gabriel Macht Net Worth

Gabriel Macht Net Worth $9 million USD Annual Income $2 million USD Personal Investments $4 million USD Luxury Cars –03 $500,000 USD

Gabriel Macht Cars included in his Net Worth

The Car collection of Gabriel Macht is quite Small. Gabriel Macht owns few of the best luxury cars in the world. The Car brands owned by Gabriel Macht include Mercedes Benz, Jaguar and Range Rover.

Gabriel Macht House included in his Net Worth

Gabriel Macht Resides in Los Angeles, California, U.S. Gabriel Macht bought this luxury home in 2014. Estimated Value of this Real Estate Property is around $1.7 Million.

Gabriel Macht Biography

Gabriel Macht was born in The Bronx, New York, the son of Suzanne Victoria Pulier, a museum curator and archivist, and actor Stephen Macht. Gabriel Macht has three siblings, Jesse, a musician (who appeared on The Next Great American Band), Ari Serbin, and Julie. Both of his parents are Jewish.

Gabriel Macht was raised in California from the age of five. After graduating Beverly Hills High School, Gabriel Macht attended Carnegie Mellon College of Fine Arts, where he graduated in 1994. During his time at Carnegie Mellon, he became a member of Delta Upsilonfraternity.

Gabriel Macht was nominated for the Best Young Motion Picture Actor Award after playing his first role at age eight in the film Why Would I Lie?under the stage name Gabriel Swann.

Gabriel Macht has appeared in many film and television roles including A Love Song for Bobby Long, Because I Said So, The Recruit, and Archangel. For the 2001 film Behind Enemy Lines, Gabriel Macht spent a week at sea filming on the flight deck, corridors, and hangar bay #3 of the USS Carl Vinson.

Gabriel Macht played the title role in Frank Miller’s 2008 adaptation of Will Eisner’s comic creation The Spirit. Although the film was a failure upon theatrical release, the film and Macht himself both gained a cult following.

In July 2010, it was announced that Gabriel Macht had signed on to star in the new USA Network drama Suits, which was originally known under the working title A Legal Mind.

The show has been a success for Gabriel and USA Network, and was renewed for a seventh season to be aired in July 2017.

Although not listed in the credits on the official USA Network page, Gabriel Macht’s name along with co-star Patrick J. Adams’ name appeared as “co-producers” during the end credits of each episode during season 3.

Gabriel Macht married Australian-born actress Jacinda Barrett in 2004. The couple’s first child, a girl, Satine Anais Geraldine Macht, was born August 20, 2007 in Los Angeles. They had a second child, a son named Luca, on February 26, 2014.

Gabriel Macht has been the best friend of his Suits co-star Sarah Rafferty for over 20 years ever since they met in 1993 at the Williamstown Theatre Festival. Gabriel Macht is a vegetarian and practices green living.

Data Analysis : Gabriel Macht Net Worth

We can easily conclude that Gabriel Macht is one of the highest net worth Actors in the world. Gabriel Macht Net Worth has been on the top of the charts since many weeks.

Gabriel Macht Net Worth will keep growing at a staggering pace in the coming months. This data provided by us on Gabriel Macht Net Worth is just on estimated basis and statistical analysis.
